sect2.title: iRename
sect2.para: rename is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. The rename clause changes the name of columns in a table. There are two main ways columns are renamed: either renaming a list of columns individually, or renaming all of the columns at once.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select Employee rename {ID Identification} rename Emp;
Emp.Identification Emp.Name ------------------ -------- 1 Joe 2 John 3 Josh 4 Jeff 5 Jake 6 Jeff
